Articles.Content: If you have Kerbal Space Program on steam you have normaly see you can now unlock badges for games but do you have any idea how i have to do for unlock the KSP badge ? (sorry for some words my english is very bad)
Don't have KSP on Steam, but shouldn't the badges tell you what you need to do to unlock them?

You get them by just playing but the game only drops a limited amount of cards. so when you run out of card drops you need to trade for them, buy them off of steam market, or get randomly selected for booster packs. ( This is for Steam if you didn't know)

http://steamcommunity.com/tradingcards/

All you need to know about these.

To make it simple, you get some cards just by playing the game to get the others you have to trade with friends or to buy them on the market.

Once you have a full set, you can craft the game badge, it will give you games coupon, Steam emoticon, profile background, etc.

Pure fun, if you like to collect things.

And free money if you don't like them and sell them on the market.
I've got a spare ground control if anyone wants to trade (also got a load of other cards I'll happily trade)
